trans-unit.source: Represents a panel that arranges <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Representa um painel que organiza objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGalleryCategoriesPanel" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGalleryCategoriesPanel" />.

trans-unit.source: The size that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGalleryCategoriesPanel" /> needs to position its child elements.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho de que o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGalleryCategoriesPanel" /> precisa para posicionar seus elementos filho.

trans-unit.source: Positions and sizes the child elements in this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGalleryCategoriesPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: Posiciona e dimensiona os elementos filho neste <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGalleryCategoriesPanel" />.

trans-unit.source: The actual size of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGalleryCategoriesPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho real do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGalleryCategoriesPanel" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether scrolling on the horizontal axis is possible.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se é possível rolar no eixo horizontal.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> in all cases for <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGalleryCategoriesPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="false" /> em todos os casos para <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGalleryCategoriesPanel" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="false" /> em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: When set, the value of this property is always coerced to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Quando definido, o valor dessa propriedade sempre é forçado para `false`.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether scrolling on the vertical axis is possible.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se é possível rolar no eixo vertical.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> in all cases for <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGalleryCategoriesPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> em todos os casos para <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGalleryCategoriesPanel" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: When set, the value of this property is always coerced to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Quando definido, o valor dessa propriedade sempre é forçado para `true`.

trans-unit.source: Gets the vertical size of the scrolled content in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tamanho vertical do conteúdo rolados em [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The vertical size of the scrolled content in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: O tamanho vertical do conteúdo rolados para [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Gets the horizontal size of the scrolled content in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tamanho horizontal do conteúdo rolado em [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The horizontal size of the scrolled content in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: O tamanho horizontal do conteúdo rolados para [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Gets the horizontal offset of the scrolled content in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Obtém o deslocamento horizontal do conteúdo rolado em [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The horizontal offset of the scrolled content in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: O deslocamento horizontal do conteúdo rolados para [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Scrolls the content down by one line.
trans-unit.target: Rola o conteúdo para baixo em uma linha.

trans-unit.source: Scrolls the content left by one line.
trans-unit.target: Rola o conteúdo à esquerda em uma linha.

trans-unit.source: Scrolls the content right by one line.
trans-unit.target: Rola o conteúdo à direita em uma linha.

trans-unit.source: Scrolls the content up by one line.
trans-unit.target: Rola o conteúdo para cima em uma linha.

trans-unit.source: The object to make visible.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a ser deixado visível.

trans-unit.source: A bounding rectangle that identifies the coordinate space to be made visible.
trans-unit.target: Um retângulo delimitador que identifica o espaço de coordenadas a ficar visível.

trans-unit.source: Forces content to scroll until the coordinate space of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> object is visible.
trans-unit.target: Força o conteúdo a rolar até que o espaço de coordenadas de um objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> esteja visível.

trans-unit.source: The rectangle that is visible.
trans-unit.target: O retângulo que está visível.

trans-unit.source: The maximum size of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGalleryCategoriesPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho máximo do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGalleryCategoriesPanel" />.

trans-unit.source: Measures the child elements in this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGalleryCategoriesPanel" /> in preparation of arranging them during the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGalleryCategoriesPanel.ArrangeOverride(System.Windows.Size)" /> pass.
trans-unit.target: Mede os elementos filho neste <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGalleryCategoriesPanel" /> em preparação para organizá-los durante a passagem de <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGalleryCategoriesPanel.ArrangeOverride(System.Windows.Size)" />.

trans-unit.source: The desired size of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGalleryCategoriesPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho desejado do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGalleryCategoriesPanel" />.

trans-unit.source: Scrolls the content down the number of lines indicated by the <see cref="P:System.Windows.SystemParameters.WheelScrollLines" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Rola o conteúdo para baixo o número de linhas indicado pela propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.SystemParameters.WheelScrollLines" />.

trans-unit.source: Scrolls the content left the number of lines indicated by the <see cref="P:System.Windows.SystemParameters.WheelScrollLines" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Rola o conteúdo para a esquerda o número de linhas indicado pela propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.SystemParameters.WheelScrollLines" />.

trans-unit.source: Scrolls the content right the number of lines indicated by the <see cref="P:System.Windows.SystemParameters.WheelScrollLines" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Rola o conteúdo para a direita o número de linhas indicado pela propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.SystemParameters.WheelScrollLines" />.

trans-unit.source: Scrolls the content up the number of lines indicated by the <see cref="P:System.Windows.SystemParameters.WheelScrollLines" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Rola o conteúdo para cima o número de linhas indicado pela propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.SystemParameters.WheelScrollLines" />.

trans-unit.source: Invoked when a layout pass begins.
trans-unit.target: Invocado quando começa um cálculo de layout.

trans-unit.source: This method invalidates the measurements of elements in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGalleryCategoriesPanel>.
trans-unit.target: Esse método invalida as medidas de elementos de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGalleryCategoriesPanel>.

trans-unit.source: Scrolls the content down by one page.
trans-unit.target: Rola o conteúdo para baixo em uma página.

trans-unit.source: Scrolls the content left by one page.
trans-unit.target: Rola o conteúdo para a esquerda em uma página.

trans-unit.source: Scrolls the content right by one page.
trans-unit.target: Rola o conteúdo para a direita em uma página.

trans-unit.source: Scrolls the content up by one page.
trans-unit.target: Rola o conteúdo para cima em uma página.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> element that controls scrolling behavior.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> que controla o comportamento de rolagem.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> element that controls scrolling behavior.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> elemento que controla o comportamento de rolagem.

trans-unit.source: The amount that content is horizontally offset in the containing viewport in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: A quantidade de deslocamento horizontal do conteúdo no visor recipiente em [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Sets the amount that content is horizontal offset in the containing viewport in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Define a quantidade de deslocamento horizontal do conteúdo no visor recipiente em [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The amount that content is vertically offset in the containing viewport in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: A quantidade de deslocamento vertical do conteúdo no visor recipiente em [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Sets the amount that content is vertical offset in the containing viewport in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Define a quantidade de deslocamento vertical do conteúdo no visor recipiente em [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> that this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGalleryCategoriesPanel" /> hosts items for.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> para o qual que este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGalleryCategoriesPanel" /> hospeda itens.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> that this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGalleryCategoriesPanel" /> hosts items for.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> que este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGalleryCategoriesPanel" /> hospeda itens.

trans-unit.source: Gets the vertical offset of the scrolled content in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Obtém o deslocamento vertical do conteúdo rolado em [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The vertical offset of the scrolled content in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: O deslocamento vertical do conteúdo rolados para [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Gets the vertical size of the content's visible range in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tamanho vertical do intervalo visível do conteúdo em [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The vertical size of the content's visible range in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: O tamanho vertical visível do conteúdo intervalo de em [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Gets the horizontal size of the content's visible range in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tamanho horizontal do intervalo visível do conteúdo em [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The horizontal size of the content's visible range in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: O tamanho horizontal visível do conteúdo intervalo de em [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
